name: Skullcrusher Dumbbells
how_to_perform:
* Lie on your back with your dumbbells over your shoulders, palms facing each other.

* Lower the dumbbells to a position just above your ears, keeping your elbows close to your body.

* Push the dumbbells up and apart until they are fully extended overhead.

* Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to their starting position on your shoulders.

* Focus on squeezing your shoulder muscles as you push the dumbbells upward.

* Use a slow and controlled tempo, pausing briefly at the top of each repetition before lowering.
short_summary: Skullcrusher dumbbells is a strength training exercise targeting the shoulders, triceps, and chest.
